name: Full Metal Burger
description: Fresh, hand-made, quarter-pound ground beef patty with melted cheese and lettuce, tomato, onion

name: Black Bean Society Veggie Burger
description: 100% non-beef (black bean) patty with melted cheese and lettuce, tomato, onion

name: Legion of Shrooms Burgers
description: Fresh, hand-made, quarter-pound ground beef patty with two slices of melted swiss over grilled mushrooms and carmelized onions, served with creamy dijon mustard on the bun

name: Rest in Pesto (RIP) Burger
description: Fresh, hand-made, quarter-pound ground beef patty, and melted mozzarella over two fresh tomato slices and marinara sauce, served with basil pesto spread on the bun

name: South of Heaven Burger
description: Two fresh, hand-made, quarter-pound ground beef patties (1/2 half pound total), two slices of spicy cheddar cheese infused with buffalo sauce and hot peppers, hellfire pickles, pickled jalapeno slices, grilled onions, bacon, and sriracho mayo

name: Getcha Pull'd Chicken
description: Slow-cooked shredded chicken marinated in salsa, served with melted shredded cheese and lettuce, tomato, onion on a bun

name: Nachos by Thy Name
description: Tortilla chips smothered in melted, shredded cheese and getcha pull'd chicken, topped with a blended guacamole and sour cream sauce. Salsa, jalape√±os, and hot peppers served on the side.
